Nicholes Wong, Diploma in Business Management at Nanyang PolytechnicLevel 6. MasterUpdated on 07 Jun 2019REITs are part of equitites, there is no definite allocation percentage. You dont have to follow the age rule of thumb as well because if you are a person who cant take too much risk, you would want to have more bonds. Have your emergency fund and insurance ready before you start investing. I would recommend you go for some capital growth as well not just REITs.1 comment0
Hariz Arthur Maloy07 Apr 2019No REITs are not equity. They're property. Which is another asset class. They're a substitute of high yield bonds. Similar correlation to each other.
